sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-container fluid="md" class="myContainer">
      <b-row>
        <b-col cols="7" offset="1" offset-md="2">
          <b-form-input v-model="text" placeholder="Enter your name"></b-form-input>
        </b-col>
        <b-col cols="3">
          <b-button>Create New</b-button>
        </b-col>
      </b-row>
      <b-row>
        <b-col v-for="camel in camels" v-bind:key="camel._id" cols="12" sm="6" md="4">
            <camel-item v-bind:camel="camel" v-on:del-camel="deleteCamel"/>
        </b-col>
      </b-row>
    </b-container>
</template>

<script>
import CamelItem from '../components/CamelItem.vue'
import { Api } from '@/Api'

export default {
  name: 'camels',
  components: {
    'camel-item': CamelItem
  },
  mounted() {
    console.log('PAGE is loaded!')
    Api.get('/camels')
      .then(response => {
        console.log(response)
        this.camels = response.data.camels
      })
      .catch(error => {
        this.camels = []
        console.log(error)
        //   TODO: display some error message instead of logging to console
      })
      .then(() => {
        console.log('This runs every time after success or error.')
      })
  },
  methods: {
    deleteCamel(id) {
      console.log(`Delete camel with id ${id}`)
      Api.delete(`/camels/${id}`)
        .then(response => {
          const index = this.camels.findIndex(camel => camel._id === id)
          this.camels.splice(index, 1)
        })
        // TODO: catch error
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      camels: [],
      text: ''
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
.myContainer {
  background-color: aqua;
  border: solid;
}
</style>
